bug.short_desc: abiword icon source is used instead of actual icon

long_desc.thetext:
In Fedora 24 alpha, the AbiWord package distributes the source SVG instead of using a resulting icon SVG. In gnome-shell, the SVG file is selected, so AbiWord erroneously has all icon sizes in its icon.
The distributed icon source file selected as an icon: /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps/abiword.svg
What it should look like (except, in vectors, as a single SVG icon): /usr/share/icons/hicolor/512x512/apps/abiword.png
An ideal solution would be to use the resulting AbiWord SVG icon instead of the source SVG. A less than ideal solution (but a solution nontheless) would be to simply not distribute the SVG source and fall back on using only PNG icons.

This was fixed upstream. Here's the patch:
https://github.com/AbiWord/abiword/commit/b0c7c0c971d15091b280ff9ba0d4abbfc94f9d1b.patch
And here's a visual diff:
https://github.com/AbiWord/abiword/commit/b0c7c0c971d15091b280ff9ba0d4abbfc94f9d1b?short_path=10fc502#diff-10fc5020166685caf25ae700dcee4921
Will be in 3.0.2 I should actually release one day.
